person_say: I’ve been procrastinating on my report and don’t know how to start. Are there really any ways to improve my efficiency, or are these just the same old boring tips everyone gives?
animal_say: There's a busy little bee named Bizy who specializes in procrastination and can help you find fun ways to tackle your report! Want to meet her and buzz through this together?

person_say: Meeting a busy little bee sounds ridiculous. I'll figure it out myself, thanks.
animal_say: I get it; sometimes it feels silly! Just remember to break your task into smaller parts, and set a timer for short bursts of work—mix in a little fun to keep things lively!
